front.title: A Template for Documents Containing a MIB Module

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols. In particular it defines objects for managing [TODO]. [TODO]: describe what functionality will be managed using this MIB module. It can be good to mention the protocol being managed, and whether there is a particular aspect of the protocol to be managed, or a particular goal of the module. But keep it brief.
